name: The Parish
description:
Currently in development - constructive criticism welcomed

Spend a week in the life of a vicar in this text based simulation game. 

Make choices over how to spend your time and how to respond to people, balancing the different parts of your role:

  • loving the people that you meet
  • loving God
  • being aware of the boundaries of the self

Interact and choose your own path, prepare a sermon, run meetings, pray, visit people in need, resist temptation (or not).

There are lots of different choices available and hidden choices to unlock.

Play as yourself, or a people pleaser, or a saint or an evil vicar...

and don't take it too seriously!
